Description: Perform a series of queries by performing modified calculations from 3 - 4 of the older modules and submit the correct combination of colors. Tags: 9-buttons, rainbow, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, black, white
Name: Deceptive Rainbow Arrows

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask about the following questions: "What were the 3 correct responses when you queried them?", "How many arrows clockwise from white to the relevant arrow?", "What were the colors relevant arrows flashes?", "What was the binary representation of the arrow flashes?"
